sentences.en: An atom is the smallest indivisible particle of matter.
sentences.cn: 原子是最小的不可分的物质微粒.

sentences.en: Attachment is the indivisible parts of the contract.
sentences.cn: 本合同附件为本合同不可分割的一部分.

sentences.en: Far from being separate, the mind and body form an indivisible whole.
sentences.cn: 心智与身体绝不是分离的,它们形成了一个不可分割的整体。

sentences.en: For many years the atom was believed to be indivisible.
sentences.cn: 在过去有很多年原子一直被认为是不可分割的.

sentences.en: For us d 6 tente is indivisible.
sentences.cn: 对我们说来,缓和是不可分割的.

sentences.en: He thought consciousness is continuous flow of human psychology is indivisible role.
sentences.cn: 他认为意识是连续不断流动的,人的心理是作为不可分割的整体发挥作用的.

sentences.en: Hobbes argues for absolute, indivisible sovereignty.
sentences.cn: 霍布斯主张绝对且不可分割的王权.

sentences.en: Music is an indivisible part of my life.
sentences.cn: 英文“音乐是我生命中不可分割的一部分”怎么说?

sentences.en: Peace, development and environmental protection are interdependent and indivisible.
sentences.cn: 和平 、 发展与环境保护三者是互相依存,不可分割的.

sentences.en: Science and art indivisible. Science embodies plenty of art thinking and art contains reasonable logic thinking.
sentences.cn: 艺术与科学有着不可分割的关系, 科学渗透着丰富的艺术思维,艺术蕴涵着缜密的逻辑思维.

sentences.en: Small as atoms are, they are not indivisible.
sentences.cn: 原子虽小, 但并不是不可分隔的.

sentences.en: Sports have an indivisible relationship with economy and market.
sentences.cn: 体育与经济,体育与市场产生了密不可分的联系.

sentences.en: The appendix ( Property list ) is an indivisible part of this contract.
sentences.cn: 合同的附件是本合同不可分割的组成部分.

sentences.en: The atom was longer regarded as indivisible, but as complex.
sentences.cn: 原子不再被认为是不可分的了, 而是看成一种复合物.

sentences.en: The two processes are tightly coupled as a single indivisible process.
sentences.cn: 这两个进程紧密结合,成为不可分割的单一进程.

sentences.en: There are indivisible historical origins between art education and science education.
sentences.cn: 艺术教育和科学教育有着不可分割的历史渊源.

trans.tran_cn: 不可分的，不能除尽的，不可分割，除不尽
trans.tran_en: something that is indivisible cannot be separated or divided into parts
